tool.name: Pplacer
tool.description: Makes a placement using pplacer maximum likelihood algorithm

param.name: inputtree
param.label: Reference tree made with reference sequences (RAxML or Phyml)

param.name: inputcombo
param.label: Aligned reads to reference MSA (HMM) in stokholm format

tool.help: Placement of reads on a reference tree. Reads must be prealigned to a reference alignment with HMM, and the file in stockholm format. Pplacer needs a info/stat file to know the evolutionary model for placement.
